text: The 2024 European Parliament election is going to be held on 6 to 9 June 2024. This will be the tenth election since the first direct elections in 1979, and the first European Parliament election after Brexit. 720 MEPs are to be elected. That election will be the second largest election in the world, according to media; The election in India, is larger.https://www.nrk.no/urix/europaparlamentsvalget-er-verdens-nest-storste- valg-1.16788591. Retrieved 2024-03-21 ==References== Category:2024 elections in Europe Category:European Parliament Category:June 2024 events
title: 2024 European Parliament election
